features.title: Nano Banana Core Features
features.description: Professional AI image generation tool providing powerful technical support for creators

naturalLanguage.title: Natural Language Editing
naturalLanguage.description: Supports Chinese and English descriptions, intelligently understands user intent, and accurately restores described content for more intuitive creation.

characterConsistency.title: Character Consistency
characterConsistency.description: Powerful character retention capability ensures the same character maintains stable features across different scenes, suitable for series creation.

sceneRetention.title: Scene Retention
sceneRetention.description: Intelligent scene recognition and retention, supports background environment consistency, allowing multiple images to form coherent visual stories.

highQuality.title: High-Quality Output
highQuality.description: Advanced AI algorithms ensure high-quality generated images, supporting multiple resolutions and formats to meet different needs.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Common questions and answers about Nano Banana

whatIs.question: What is Nano Banana?
whatIs.answer: Nano Banana is a professional AI image generation tool that can generate high-quality images based on user text descriptions. It excels in maintaining character consistency and scene retention, making it an ideal choice for designers, artists, and content creators.

coreFeatures.question: What are the core features of Nano Banana?
coreFeatures.answer: Nano Banana's main features include: natural language editing (supports Chinese and English), character consistency maintenance, scene retention, high-quality image generation, and support for multiple artistic styles.

howToUse.question: How to use Nano Banana to generate images?
howToUse.answer: Using Nano Banana is very simple: 1) Enter detailed text descriptions; 2) Choose appropriate parameter settings; 3) Click the generate button; 4) Wait about 30 seconds to get high-quality images.

formats.question: What image formats does Nano Banana support?
formats.answer: Nano Banana supports various mainstream image formats, including PNG, JPG, etc. You can choose the appropriate format and resolution according to your specific needs.

generationTime.question: How long does it take to generate an image?
generationTime.answer: Usually, Nano Banana can complete image generation within 30 seconds. The specific time depends on the complexity of the image and current server load.

differences.question: What are the differences between Nano Banana and other AI image generation tools?
differences.answer: Nano Banana excels in character consistency and Chinese support, making it particularly suitable for users who need precise control over generation results. Compared to other tools, it has significant advantages in maintaining stable character features.

targetUsers.question: Who is Nano Banana suitable for?
targetUsers.answer: Nano Banana is suitable for designers, artists, content creators, marketers, and any users who need high-quality images. Whether for commercial projects or personal creation, you can find suitable application scenarios.

betterResults.question: How to get better generation results?
betterResults.answer: To get better results, it is recommended to: 1) Use specific and detailed descriptions; 2) Set parameters reasonably; 3) Try different style keywords; 4) Practice and experiment with different description methods.
